name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Dynamic Software Engineer with 8 years of comprehensive experience in **Python** development, specializing in creating RESTful APIs and designing robust microservices architecture. Proficient in **SQL** databases including **MySQL**, **PostgreSQL**, and **MS SQL**, I leverage modern **JavaScript** frameworks like **React** to deliver high-quality, high-performance solutions. Skilled in Agile methodologies, I integrate the principles of collaboration and communication to effectively work within teams.

My technical proficiency extends to container orchestration with **Docker** and **Kubernetes**, version control using **GitHub**, and CI/CD automation tools like **Travis CI** and **Jenkins**. I possess hands-on experience deploying applications on cloud platforms including **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring seamless scalability and reliability. 

I am dedicated to delivering data-driven solutions, utilizing analytical skills and critical thinking to solve complex problems and advance project goals in the healthcare and financial sectors.
